title: The schema should be included as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when using a stored procedure
description: The schema should be included as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when using a stored procedure.
OB: In the 'Edit data set' window, when dragging a stored procedure to the QueryText, the stored procedure name should be composed of the database schema name and the stored procedure name.
EB:
Description: The schema should be included as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when using a stored procedure.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new report.
2. Drag a stored procedure to the QueryText field.
